item.description:
Foil Art Technique Workshop

Come join Julie at Studio 360 on Sunday, October 4 for a workshop to make a foil art painting.

"Weâ€™ll start with a small stretched canvas and add some collage elements and then use foil and paint to create some wonderful results. The workshop will begin at 10 and run until around 4 or 5.

All materials will be provided! There's no need to bring anything except scissors, two or three paintbrushes and a heat gun, if you have one. If you don't have a heat gun, don't worry, we can share.

The cost will be $15 to cover the materials and space rental.

I look forward to seeing you there!"

Julie

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: New Workshop - Foil Art Technique
